remarks: Transfer a universal quantifier between one variable with pair-like semantics and two.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ralxpxfr2d.a $e |- A e. _V $.
ralxpxfr2d.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. B <-> E. y e. C E. z e. D x = A ) ) $.
ralxpxfr2d.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ralxpxfr2d $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. B ps <-> A. y e. C A. z e. D ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ph x z $.
$d ps y $.
$d ps z $.
